Inzola walks along until she hears a voice, Shadow Wing's voice. Inzola wal=
ks along, Deemos following...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilove=
alllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, July 24, 2000 7:56 PM=

  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Wrath converts to his beast mode and fo=
llows Inzola*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, July 24, 2000 5:53 PM
    Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


    Deemos didn't know these spots well neither, but he =
wasn't going to say anything to Wrath about it. Inzola transformed to Termi=
te mode and led the way...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: =
ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, July 23,=
 2000 11:16 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Wrath: I'm sure we=
 could find a good one. *Wrath begins walking trough the jungle looking aro=
und* Wrath: Maybe you should lead. I don't know these spots too well.
     =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 11:06 PM
        Subject: =
Re: Neo Beast Wars


        Inzola nods to Wrath and waits for Wrath to le=
ad the way. Deemos looked at Wrath.

        "You know, I used to hunt anim=
als, but I had so many animal heads on my wall, I started hunting robots. C=
aught my fair share of Maximals and Predacons, I did! But the ones here are=
 extra powerful, good challenge!" Deemos said to Wrath...
          ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 10:50 PM
          Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Wrath: Hmm...Sound good to me! *Wrath =
says to Inzola*
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From:=
 THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Sunday, Jul=
y 23, 2000 9:05 PM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            De=
emos just stares at him.

            "Wrath, we could go and find someone =
to slag." Inzola said...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
        From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:44 PM
              Subject: Re: Ne=
o Beast Wars


              Wrath: I don't really know......Damn... I neve=
r plan ahead! Hmm...I haven't been aound for to long...Hmm... *Wrath contin=
ues thinking of something to do*
                ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
                From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:19 AM
                Subje=
ct: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                Deemos and Inzola walk to the jung=
le with Wrath.

                "Who are we hunting?" Deemos asked...
     =
             ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: iloveall=
lizards 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: =
Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:08 AM
                  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wa=
rs


                  *Wrath begins walking for the jungle*
              =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: THECODE 
    =
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Saturday,=
 July 22, 2000 5:02 AM
                    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  =
                  "Yes, let's go." Inzola said to Wrath...
                =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: iloveallliz=
ards 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      S=
ent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:53 AM
                      Subject: Re: Neo=
 Beast Wars


                      Wrath: We could try jungle? *Wrath asks=
 Deemos*
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
            =
            From: THECODE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:39 AM
             =
           Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                        "It's up t=
o you where we start." Deemos said to Wrath...
                          --=
--- Original Message ----- 
                          From: ilovealllizards=
 
                          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                       =
   Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:27 AM
                          Subject:=
 Re: Neo Beast Wars


                          *Wrath nods and smiles* Wra=
th: Where should start? *Wrath asks Inzola and Deemos*
                    =
        ----- Original Message ----- 
                            From: THE=
CODE 
                            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
           Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
                          =
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                            "Hunting? We hu=
nted down almost everyone already, but sure, we'll come." Inzola said.

   =
                         "Good to practice with our new beast modes." Deemo=
s said. He patted Wrath on the shoulder.

                            "Thos=
e Alliance and Preds will be sorry they wouldn't let us join!" Deemos said.=
 Inzola looked at Wrath.

                            "The Maximals, most o=
f them just don't got it, but a few stand out, you are one of those few." I=
nzola said to Wrath...
                              ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
                              From: ilovealllizards 
              =
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                              Sent:=
 Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
                              Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


                              *Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well.=
.....We can go scouting...hmm....I've haven't had much to do...We go huntin=
g? *Wrath asks Deemos and Inzola*
                                ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
                                From: THECODE 
       =
                         To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          =
      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
                               =
 Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                                Inzola smile=
s and shakes Wrath's hand.

                                "Nice to meet s=
uch a charming and powerful bot upon my repair." Inzola said. Deemos and In=
zola hugged for about 5 seconds and then looked back to Wrath.

           =
                     "So, what are we supposed to do right now?" Deemos ask=
ed Wrath...
                                ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
                               From: ilovealllizards 
                     =
           To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Sa=
turday, July 22, 2000 12:53 AM
                                Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


                                Wrath: I am Wrath and you=
 must be the Inzola that Deemos spoke about. A pleasure to meet you. *Wrath=
 extends his hand for a hand shake*
                                ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
                                From: THECODE 
     =
                           To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        =
        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM
                            =
    Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                                Deemos looked=
 at the CR Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

    =
                            "Maximal base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola=
 said. Deemos laughed.

                                "Who are you?" Inzo=
la asked Wrath.

                                Gangon's spark is still wa=
iting.

                                Artist runs around in a circle, pla=
ying his stupid games he believed exercises him. He runs away from the Maxi=
mal base and to a mountain. He runs into the mountain and an avalanche star=
ts, Artist is burried, various thoughts pass through his mind. Hours later,=
 he awakes.

                                "Oh, that was some blow, but I=
'll go with the flow." Artist said.

                                "Plint=
issa? Where are you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. =
He remembered that she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were wo=
rking, so he ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

        =
                        "Plintissa dear? You don't remember me? For me deat=
h was near." Artist said. Plintissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist=
's arms. Artist laughed and they kissed. After the kiss.

                 =
               "Do me a favor, Artist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said. =
She kissed him.

                                "Okay, I won't rhyme, we'l=
l have a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both laughed and Artist took P=
lintissa to a grassy plain.

                                Dracona held u=
p her scanning device in front of Scorponok's face.

                      =
          "I can find that device I lost." Dracona said.

                 =
               "Then I'll give it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my blas=
ter, it is an ice gun." Dracona said. She looked at Scorponok with big beau=
tiful eyes. Sinister and Sinesis stared at her, mouths agape.

            =
                    The Radicons sat there still...
